column7: effectSummary (one sentence)

Double any one of 
your dice rolls

Double both of 
your dice rolls

Reroll one dice 
and choose which 
roll to take

Reroll both dice 
and choose which 
roll to take
All players give their action card decks to the player on their left

Steal a card of 
your choice from 
a player’s deck
Exchange a card from your hand with a card of your choice from another player
Steal a whole deck from a player and distribute the cards with other players how you see fit

A player of your choice 
is stunned and skips 
their turn

You have 1 minute to go through the discard pile and keep two cards 
of your choice

All players are skipped, 
and you take your next 
turn immediately

Copy the last card 
played by the player 
before you
Add +4 to any one of your movement dice roll, pawn interactions while moving still apply
Add +6 to any one of your movement dice roll, pawn interactions while moving still apply

Teleport to any tile up to  6 tiles forward or backward,
pawn interactions  do not apply
Jump over a tile, if any pawns are present on the tile, interactions do not apply
Swap any pawn on the board with any pawn of your choice
As a reaction, you can reduce an opponent’s pawn’s movement by half - rounded down
Pull any pawn closer to your pawn by 3 tiles
As a reaction, link your pawn to an opponent’s pawn closest to you - for one round, your pawn will get pulled the same number of tiles as them
Push any pawn away from your pawn by 3 tiles

Increases 
attack range  up to 1 tile

Increases 
attack range  up to 3 tiles

Increases
attack range  up to 6 tiles
Increases attack range up to 2 tiles, can attack through walls
Attacks all pawns in a single line till the end of the board front and back
Infects the pawn, any pawn within 1 tile range is also infected. On your turn, roll 3 or higher to survive.
Cures any infections
Bring a pawn back on the board after being removed, they start at home
As reaction, distract an attack on you, attacker has to roll  4 or above to make a successful attack

As a reaction, 
defends against any 
attack, except for Laser
As a reaction, defends against any attack except for Laser,  against melee - the attacker takes a point of damage

As a reaction, 
deflects laser 
at a right angle

As a reaction, 
cancel a pawn’s 
action against you
